## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e0ca4dfebc7839330f25a231f2f87af41aef50ea715541751bef46a1709f045e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'facebook-for-woocommerce' @ 3.6.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
